channel.title: [508]90% g.e help!
channel.description: Hi I'm been working lately on a fully working Grand Exchange till now i got it all working except for this.. I need a files to be loaded like the Autospawn.cfg [code] public void GEread(Player p, GEitem, GEMin, GEMed, GEMax,) { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/GEitems.cfg"));[/code] i want it to be like [code]GEread = GEitem GEMin GEMed GEMax GEread = 100 50 100 150[/code] but when it does sets GEMin to 50 for that itemid (50) and sets GEMed to 100 for that itemid only (50)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 03:24:14 am[/size][hr]Bump

item.title: [508]90% g.e help!
item.dc:creator: @angel-in-war angel-in-war
item.description:
@angel-in-war wrote:

Hi
I’m been working lately on a fully working Grand Exchange till now i got it all working except for this…
I need a files to be loaded like the Autospawn.cfg

public void GEread(Player p, GEitem, GEMin, GEMed, GEMax,) { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/GEitems.cfg"));
i want it to be like

GEread = GEitem GEMin GEMed GEMax GEread = 100 50 100 150
but when it does
sets GEMin to 50 for that itemid (50)
and sets GEMed to 100 for that itemid only (50)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 03:24:14 am[/size][hr]Bump

Read full topic
